entry.title: WIND WARNING ENDED, Burgeo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:00 AM NST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.8°C

Observed at: Burgeo 01:30 AM NST Sunday 05 February 2023

Humidity: 96 %

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries after midnight then partly cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas near midnight. Wind becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:40 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:40 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening. Forecast issued 11:40 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
